jobInfo.postDescription:
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with other professionals to determine functional and non-functional requirements for new software or applications
Use tools and methodologies to create representations for functions and user interfaces of desired products with attention to system integration and feasibility
Define all aspects of development from appropriate technology and workflow to coding standards
Communicate successfully all concepts and guidelines to the development team
Oversee the progress of the development team to ensure consistency with the initial design
Provide technical guidance and coaching to developers and engineers
Ensure software meets all requirements of quality, security, modifiability, extensibility etc.
Problem-solving & conflict resolution
Qualifications:
Minimum Requirements:
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or a related field
Excellent know-how in the automotive development business
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Excellent written/verbal in English
5-7 years of working experience in cloud-based software development or in-house DevOps platform development
Hands-on experience in software development
Proven experience as a software architect
Experience in software development and coding in various languages (C#, .NET, Java etc.)
Excellent knowledge of software and application design and architecture
Excellent knowledge of UML and other modeling methods
Familiarity with HTML/CSS, JavaScript and UI/UX design
Understanding of software quality assurance principles
Master Jenkins pipeline development
Proficient with clean code principles
Proficient with at least one DevOps Integration Platform Jenkins, GitHub Action, Bamboo, Azure DevOps Pipeline
Preferred Skills
DevOps
Kubernetes and Cloud
Experience with the Agile method
Personal Attributes:
Strong responsible
jobInfo.address: 武汉洪山区街道口南村供电宿舍3-210

brandComInfo.introduce: 公司专注数字化转型，软件技术架构，企业管理咨询，具有领先的方案和案例经验，团队来自HP，IBM跨国企业，在相关领域深耕十余年。
